column3: The Trials of the Braves is a nine-volume work of literature which tells of the heroic feats of the Zodiac Braves.
As I mentioned earlier, I'm willing to part with each book for the discounted price of 100 <SheetEn(Item,3,　28,2,1)/>.
By defeating all the foes listed within a book of the Trials of the Braves, your relic weapon atma will gain in attributes.
Distinct sets of Trials of the Braves exist for each relic. A set is comprised of nine books, of which only four are available for exchange at first.
A paladin's set comprises seven books for Curtana, and two for the Holy Shield. Only six of these are available for exchange at first.
Each book can be purchased from G'jusana. Please note, however, that you can possess only one at any given time.
You must complete all of the objectives in a book before you may purchase another.
Alternately, you may also dispose of it by speaking with G'jusana, or via the Key Items menu.
This concludes the explanation of the enhancement process. May your relic drink deep of the souls of your enemies!
